remarks: Unpack the interval covering property using closed intervals. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Mar-2014.)
statement:
ovolficc $p |- ( ( A C_ RR /\ F : NN --> ( <_ i^i ( RR X. RR ) ) ) -> ( A C_ U. ran ( [,] o. F ) <-> A. z e. A E. n e. NN ( ( 1st ` ( F ` n ) ) <_ z /\ z <_ ( 2nd ` ( F ` n ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d A n z $.
